title: 'Radhe Shyam' celeb review: Here's what they have to say about Prabhas and Pooja Hegde starrer
excerpt: Radhe Shyam Review: Prabhas and Pooja Hegde are saddled with a screenplay that allows them little room for manoeuvre. The end result is calamitous.

content.text:
All pomp and show, 
Radhe Shyam
 is a godawfully turgid romantic drama that sucks the air out of the genre with crushing gusts of bombast and pomposity. Prettiness overload and unrelenting obscurantism defeat the film's avowed purpose of asserting that the fate of human beings lies not in the lines on their palms but in the strength of their hands.
Lead actors Prabhas and Pooja Hegde are saddled with a screenplay (written by director Radha Krishna Kumar) that allows them little room for manoeuvre. The duo is forced to play along with their hands tied. The end result is calamitous.
1502109126847266821
1502184784159645701
1502244525137604608
Neither is able rise above the rubble of a film that kicks up a storm in the climax and leaves the hero to fight the raging elements on a sinking ship (in the literal sense and otherwise). They fail to make any emotional connect with the audience but certainly not for want of trying. How far can actors go with platitudes that are not only empty but also confused?
1502296848119513091
Radhe Shyam
, filmed in Telugu and Hindi simultaneously with two separate soundtracks and released nationwide, is projected as a big-budget extravaganza meant to sweep us off our feet. Parts of the film come close to achieving that end. With large portions of it shot in Europe, it is replete with lavish imagery and spectacular visual effects. But not much of what the film serves up delivers the sensory highs that it aims for.
Radhe Shyam
 is prettified piffle that is sought to be palmed off as an earnest exploration of life and death, destiny and human endeavour, palmistry and science, and love and loss. Cinematographer Manoj Paramahamsa - besides lending a part of his name to a key character in the film - delivers unblemished and impressive compositions all right, but in the absence of a palpable and passable context for all the superficial 'beauty' that is on show, the undeniably good work that he and the visual effects team do is rendered ineffectual.

A voiceover by Amitabh Bachchan on the 
pyaar
-and-
kismat
 dichotomy sets the tone for the 140-minute film that simply does not possess the power to match the gravitas of the narrator's famed baritone. There is no doubt, of course, that Prabhas' screen presence is tremendous but, caught in a milieu that makes little use of what he brings to the table he is reduced to being sub-par.
The climactic stretch of 
Radhe Shyam
 lets the star slip into action-hero mode - though he isn't taking on a human villain here - and this is where Prabhas seems far more at home than at any other point in the film.
1502296616962871301
1502285715358560256
1502287940680294404
1502290071067656196
The male protagonist of 
Radhe Shyam
 is a soothsayer who is described in one of the initial sequences as "the Einstein of palmistry" and, in a later scene, as "the Nostradamus of India". In case you aren't suitably impressed by these monikers, the man in question, Vikramaditya, has the temerity to read Indira Gandhi's palm and forecast the advent of the Emergency.
He flees the fallout of the daring forecast and ends up in faraway Rome where he continues to ply his trade with success. In the course of his Italian peregrinations, he espies the beautiful and impulsive Prerna (Hegde) on a train that appears to be carrying no other passenger and is destined for no particular place on the railway map.
The adventurous lady is a doctor who works in a Rome hospital headed by her stern uncle (Sachin Khedekar) who, on his part, is firm in his belief that Vikramaditya is a charlatan. Needless to say, the boy-meets-girl moment does no go waste. Vikramaditya falls in love with Prerna although he never misses an opportunity to assert that he isn't the "relationship type" but the "flirtation-ship type".
No matter what ship the guy is on, it is easy to foresee that neither he nor the film is headed in the direction of a smooth ride. Speaking of rides, one chase, which begins after Vikramaditya has summarily told a reluctant businessman (Jagapathi Babu in a special appearance) that he has no future in politics, ends with the hero throwing himself under what looks like a bus but is subsequently called an ambulance.
Vikramaditya wakes up in a bed in the very hospital that Prerna serves. Where else would he go when the film will have us believe that everything is written on the man's palm? He is quick to point out to the heroine that he is never going to fall in love, marry and settle down because that is what fate has in store for him.
The rest of 
Radhe Shyam
 is devoted to proving the hero wrong. Fair enough, but the methods that the film employs are painfully predictable and excruciating tortuous.
Radhe Shyam
 is a choppy, meandering affair that expends a great deal of time on establishing that Vikramaditya is a master of his craft before deciding to backtrack and change the messaging completely - and confoundingly. It takes the spectre of death and a fearsome tsunami for the change of heart to happen.
The palmist may be good at his job, but life is too precious to be left at the mercy of his prognosis - this is what the film is trying to ntell its audience. The heroine's life - and destiny - become the testing ground for that supposition.
To bolster the argument, 
Radhe Shyam
 factors in a cameo for Riddhi Kumar as a young girl who aspires to make a name for herself in the sport of archery. Along the way, Vikramaditya makes a few other spot-on predictions, which strengthen his reputation as a fortune-teller.
The cast of 
Radhe Shyam
 includes Jayaram as a hypochondriac who refuses to vacate his hospital bed, Krishnam Raju as the hero's blind perpetually pontificating guru, Bhagyashree in the role of the hero's mother and Kunaal Roy Kapur as the hero's best friend who stands in for him during his long absences from home.
Does any of them leave any imprint at all on the film? Well, they aren't supposed to because the focus of 
Radhe Shyam
 is firmly on the mumbo-jumbo that masquerades as sweet-nothings between the lovers who wallow in a concoction that dangles between infantilism and fatalism.

Radhe Shyam
 is an ill-formed love story that is hard to fall in love with. If the devil is in the details, he is everywhere in this film, which seems to be out to prove that the line between blockbuster and lacklustre is precariously thin.

There is no doubt, of course, that Prabhas' screen presence is tremendous but, caught in a milieu that makes little use of what he brings to the table he is reduced to being sub-par.
lets the star slip into action-hero mode - though he isn't taking on a human villain here - and this is where Prabhas seems far more at home than at any other point in the film.

is a soothsayer who is described in one of the initial sequences as "the Einstein of palmistry" and, in a later scene, as "the Nostradamus of India". In case you aren't suitably impressed by these monikers, the man in question, Vikramaditya, has the temerity to read Indira Gandhi's palm and forecast the advent of the Emergency.

He flees the fallout of the daring forecast and ends up in faraway Rome where he continues to ply his trade with success. In the course of his Italian peregrinations, he espies the beautiful and impulsive Prerna (Hegde) on a train that appears to be carrying no other passenger and is destined for no particular place on the railway map.

The adventurous lady is a doctor who works in a Rome hospital headed by her stern uncle (Sachin Khedekar) who, on his part, is firm in his belief that Vikramaditya is a charlatan. Needless to say, the boy-meets-girl moment does no go waste. Vikramaditya falls in love with Prerna although he never misses an opportunity to assert that he isn't the "relationship type" but the "flirtation-ship type".

No matter what ship the guy is on, it is easy to foresee that neither he nor the film is headed in the direction of a smooth ride. Speaking of rides, one chase, which begins after Vikramaditya has summarily told a reluctant businessman (Jagapathi Babu in a special appearance) that he has no future in politics, ends with the hero throwing himself under what looks like a bus but is subsequently called an ambulance.

Vikramaditya wakes up in a bed in the very hospital that Prerna serves. Where else would he go when the film will have us believe that everything is written on the man's palm? He is quick to point out to the heroine that he is never going to fall in love, marry and settle down because that is what fate has in store for him.
is devoted to proving the hero wrong. Fair enough, but the methods that the film employs are painfully predictable and excruciating tortuous.

is a choppy, meandering affair that expends a great deal of time on establishing that Vikramaditya is a master of his craft before deciding to backtrack and change the messaging completely - and confoundingly. It takes the spectre of death and a fearsome tsunami for the change of heart to happen.

The palmist may be good at his job, but life is too precious to be left at the mercy of his prognosis - this is what the film is trying to ntell its audience. The heroine's life - and destiny - become the testing ground for that supposition.

factors in a cameo for Riddhi Kumar as a young girl who aspires to make a name for herself in the sport of archery. Along the way, Vikramaditya makes a few other spot-on predictions, which strengthen his reputation as a fortune-teller.

includes Jayaram as a hypochondriac who refuses to vacate his hospital bed, Krishnam Raju as the hero's blind perpetually pontificating guru, Bhagyashree in the role of the hero's mother and Kunaal Roy Kapur as the hero's best friend who stands in for him during his long absences from home.
Does any of them leave any imprint at all on the film? Well, they aren't supposed to because the focus of
is firmly on the mumbo-jumbo that masquerades as sweet-nothings between the lovers who wallow in a concoction that dangles between infantilism and fatalism.

is an ill-formed love story that is hard to fall in love with. If the devil is in the details, he is everywhere in this film, which seems to be out to prove that the line between blockbuster and lacklustre is precariously thin.

title: Kolkata Knight Riders Clinch Third IPL Title with Dominant Win Over Sunrisers Hyderabad
excerpt: The Kolkata Knight Riders secured their third IPL title in stunning fashion, defeating the Sunrisers Hyderabad by eight wickets in a dominant display at the MA Chidambaram Stadium. Led by a fiery spell from Mitchell Starc and an explosive half-century from Venkatesh Iyer, KKR's comprehensive performance left SRH in disarray, capping off a memorable 2024 IPL season.

content.text:
Kolkata Knight Riders Clinch Their Third IPL Title in a Dominant Display

In a thrilling climax to the Indian Premier League 2024 season, the Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) triumphed over the Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) by eight wickets to secure their third IPL title. The match, held at the MA Chidambaram Stadium in Chennai, saw KKR deliver a masterclass in both bowling and batting, leaving SRH struggling to keep up.


Early Dominance by KKR's Bowlers

Winning the toss, SRH opted to bat first, a decision they would soon regret. KKR's bowling attack, spearheaded by the impeccable Mitchell Starc, immediately put SRH on the back foot. Starc, along with Vaibhav Arora, dismantled the SRH top order within the powerplay. The early wickets of openers and key batsmen set the tone for a low-scoring affair. Harshit Rana's clever slower balls and disciplined lines further compounded SRH's woes. The young pacer, along with veteran all-rounder Andre Russell, ensured that SRH never found their rhythm.

Varun Chakaravarthy and Sunil Narine then took control in the middle overs, choking the run flow and picking up crucial wickets. Chakaravarthy's dismissal of Shahbaz Ahmed and Narine's miserly spell of 4-0-16-1 were pivotal in restricting SRH to a mere 113 runs, the lowest total ever recorded in an IPL final.

Venkatesh Iyer's Explosive Knock

KKR's chase was led by the dynamic Venkatesh Iyer, who came out with all guns blazing. After the early loss of Narine, Iyer took charge and dismantled the SRH bowling attack with an array of powerful strokes. His assault on Bhuvneshwar Kumar was particularly devastating, with Iyer smashing 24 runs off a single over, including three sixes and two boundaries. This onslaught ensured KKR reached the highest powerplay score in an IPL final, racing to 72/1.
1794764864814239906
Despite losing Gurbaz to a controversial LBW decision, Iyer's aggression never wavered. He brought up his half-century in just 24 balls, marking his fourth consecutive 50+ score in IPL playoffs, a feat only Suresh Raina has bettered in the tournament's history.

A Commanding Finish

Captain Shreyas Iyer joined the chase with a calm and collected approach, ensuring no further hiccups as KKR closed in on the target. The duo of Venkatesh and Shreyas Iyer steered the team home with plenty of overs to spare. The final single, a paddle sweep from Venkatesh Iyer, sparked jubilant scenes among the KKR players, who stormed the field to celebrate their comprehensive victory.

Post-Match Celebrations and Reflections

As fireworks lit up the Chennai sky, KKR's captain Shreyas Iyer lifted a stump as a souvenir, his smile reflecting the team's joyous mood. Mentor Gautam Gambhir and star all-rounder Sunil Narine shared a rare emotional moment, lifting each other in celebration.
1794776214789648650
Dinesh Karthik, analyzing the match, highlighted the strategic brilliance of KKR's bowlers and the impactful performances of Varun Chakaravarthy and Harshit Rana throughout the tournament. Former cricketer Virender Sehwag lauded Venkatesh Iyer as the most impressive uncapped player of the season, noting his consistent performances in high-pressure matches.

A Knightmare for SRH

For SRH, the final was a bitter end to a promising campaign. Captain Aiden Markram and Rahul Tripathi's shot selections were questioned, as both failed to deliver when it mattered most. Despite their strong showing in the qualifiers, SRH's batting collapse in the final highlighted their vulnerabilities under pressure.

Looking Ahead

With this victory, KKR have firmly established themselves as one of the IPL's most successful franchises, adding the 2024 title to their previous wins in 2012 and 2014. The win also underscores the importance of strategic planning and the value of impactful individual performances in T20 cricket.

As the IPL season concludes, fans will look back on a tournament filled with exciting moments, unexpected twists, and outstanding cricket. For KKR, the celebrations will continue as they bask in the glory of their well-deserved triumph.

title: Kavya Maran's Emotional Speech After SRH's IPL Loss: A Masterclass in Leadership
excerpt: Sunrisers Hyderabad owner Kavya Maran's tearful speech after the IPL 2024 final wasn't just about a loss. Discover how her words turned disappointment into a lesson in resilience, leadership, and the true spirit of sports.

content.text:
The Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) may have lost the IPL 2024 final to the Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR), but team owner Kavya Maran's emotional address has won the hearts of cricket fans worldwide.  Her heartfelt speech, delivered through tears, serves as a testament to the true spirit of sportsmanship and the resilience of the SRH team.
A Heartfelt Message of Pride and Unity
Kavya Maran, known for her passionate involvement with SRH, openly displayed her emotions as she spoke to the team and fans. While acknowledging the pain of the loss, she emphasized her immense pride in the team's journey and their unwavering fighting spirit throughout the season.
"I know this loss hurts," Maran began, her voice filled with emotion. "But I want each of you to know how incredibly proud I am of what we've achieved together. Everyone is talking about us, not just because of the final, but because of the heart and fight we've shown throughout the tournament."


Celebrating the Journey, Inspiring Hope
Maran's speech went beyond the disappointment of the final. She celebrated the team's remarkable journey, highlighting their challenges, teamwork, and determination. Her words offered encouragement and hope for the future, reminding everyone that this loss is merely a stepping stone towards greater achievements.
"This season has been a rollercoaster, but every one of you has shown incredible grit and character," Maran continued. "We may not have lifted the trophy this year, but we have laid a strong foundation. This is not the end, but a new beginning."
Winning Hearts On and Off the Field
Maran's emotional yet motivational speech resonated deeply with fans and the cricketing community.  It quickly went viral on social media, drawing widespread praise for her grace, strength, and unwavering support for her team.  Her message has transcended the boundaries of the sport, inspiring countless individuals with its message of resilience and unity.
Conclusion
Kavya Maran's speech after SRH's IPL 2024 final loss will be remembered as a defining moment in the tournament. Her words serve as a powerful reminder that true victory lies not just in winning trophies, but in the spirit, passion, and resilience demonstrated on and off the field. As SRH looks ahead to future seasons, Maran's leadership and unwavering support will undoubtedly continue to inspire the team and its fans.

title: Karan Kundrra gets dolls fashioned after girlfriend Tejasswi Prakash and him; thanks fans by sharing a funny video
excerpt: Karan Kundrra and Tejasswi Prakash are in love and they aren't shy to flaunt it on social media.

content.text:
Karan Kundrra and Tejasswi Prakash are in love and they aren't shy to flaunt it on social media. They keep on commenting or tweeting on each other's posts on social media. Their cute banter cannot be missed by their fans. One of their fans gifted Karan dolls which look like him and Tejasswi. He shared a video with a hilarious post.
Dance Deewane Juniors host Karan Kundrra took to his Instagram and shared a small clip in which he showed two miniature rocking dolls that looked exactly like him and Tejasswi. He thanked the fan who had sent the doll as a gift and also tagged Tejasswi in the video.
Karan along with the video also captioned the post in a hilarious way. Karan wrote “Mushkilein kamm hi nai ho rahin @tejasswiprakash 🤣😂🌞🐍 thank you guys for sending these dolls.. love you..!!!”
Take a look at the post:

Karan And Tejasswi

After posting the video many of his fans commented on his hilarious post. One of his fans said “aaj bhi pitne ka irada ha kiya”, another fan wrote “iju get well soon in advance”, and another fan commented “What is this bhai laddoo Kai sath kuch pyar bhare reels bhi share kar do na.”
On Wednesday night, Karan had shared one of Tejasswi’s pictures where he was seen making fun of her. Karan wrote “Please return my carpet.. and plz saaf karke dena wapis.. bohot ganda kar dia tune laddoooo” and replying hin back Tejasswi said “I am gonna kill you!”
The duo's banter with each other was immensely loved by their fans. The couples have got a strong fan base who cannot get over their cute pictures.
Karan Kundrra is currently hosting the reality show Dance Deewane Juniors and Tejasswi Prakash is busy with her show Naagin 6. Supernatural drama Naagin 6's TRP has increased and it is in the top 5 club.

title: Messenger’s end-to-end encrypted chats and calls are available to everyone
excerpt: You can flick a switch and turn on privacy-protecting encryption without losing features

content.text:
Messenger added end-to-end encrypted (E2EE) chatting in 2016 when it was still called Facebook Messenger, and Meta was still Facebook. Now many things have changed, but the optional feature is fully rolled out to everyone, with toggles to encrypt text messages as well as group chats and calls. Meta has discussed switching to E2EE as a default, but that may not happen until next year at the earliest, as some regulators claim this would harm public safety.


In addition to a full rollout of the feature, Messenger has some new features to enable as well. Now, in end-to-end encrypted chats, you can use GIFs, stickers, reactions, and long-press to reply or forward messages. The encrypted chats also now support verified badges so that people can identify authentic accounts (unless it’s Elon Musk).
You can also save media exchanged in the chats, and there’s a Snapchat-style screenshot notification that will be rolling out over the next few weeks.

title: Jasmin Bhasin Breaks Her Silence On Aly Goni Marriage Rumors: 'No We Aren't Getting Married'
excerpt: Jasmin Bhasin and Aly Goni are over over heals in love, and their PDA proves it. The actress recently discussed the couple's wedding preparations; here's what she said.

content.text:
Jasmin Bhasin and Aly Goni have been dating for quite some time and have been photographed on romantic adventures, leaving their admirers in awe of their scorching chemistry. Jasmin Bhasin recently addressed the couple's marriage rumours, expressing unequivocally that there are no marital plans for the time being. Tejasswi Prakash Breaks Silence on Being 'Settled' With Karan Kundrra: 'Even Our Fights...'
In an interview with Pinkvilla, Jasmin, 31, denied rumours that she was planning to marry her partner Aly Goni shortly. They have "no plans to get married anytime soon," according to Jasmin. She also stated that they are both very ambitious and have made their professions their first focus. Read also - Bade Achhe Lagte Hain 2's Disha Parmar and Husband Rahul Vaidya Enjoy Romantic Dinner Date- See Mushy Pics

On a similar topic, Aly had previously mentioned a special announcement that would be made, and fans mistook that "special" surprise for their wedding news. Jasmin defended Aly, saying, "Aly never stated anything like this in any of the interviews." Shehnaaz Gill's Latest Pool Pics Set the Internet on Fire Fans are gushing over her sultry look as she poses in a white monokini.
Jasmin Bhasin on wedding with Aly Goni
”Aly and I had announced that we are coming up with some announcement that was conceived as we are getting married. And, we are still justifying that,” she added. They also pointed out that the special announcement was regarding their YouTube channel ‘Jasly’. She concluded, ”Wedding isn’t on the cards right now because we ourselves are kids right now.”
On work front, Jasmin Bhasin’s song titled ‘Iss Baarish Mein’ was recently released on June 14. The actress is paired opposite Shaheer Sheikh in the song which is already a blockbuster on YouTube.

Coming back to Jasmin-Aly wedding news, looks like fans need to wait a little longer for their favourite couple to finally tie the knot.

title: Joe Rogan shuts down Donald Trump JRE podcast rumors once and for all
excerpt: Joe Rogan shuts down Donald Trump JRE podcast rumors once and for all

content.text:
As the Joe Rogan Experience podcast has grown to be arguably the 
biggest show in the world, the UFC Commentator has had his fair share of
 high-profile guests on to talk about things over the years.
The likes of Kanye West, Elon Musk, Mike Tyson, Dave Chapelle, and 
Edward Snowden have all graced the JRE podcast with their presence at 
least once, and there is clamor for Rogan to get even bigger guests.
Most recently, rumors have surfaced across social media that Rogan 
would land arguably his biggest guest to date in the form of former US 
President Donald Trump, after 
he appeared on the NELK Boy’s FULL SEND show
. However, he won’t be having Trump on as a guest.

During
 episode 1793

 of the Joe Rogan Experience with Mike Baker, the podcast host noted 
that he’d become aware of the rumors after being bombarded with emails 
and messages about it.
“There’s been a whole thing where a hundred people, at least, have 
texted me and sent me emails and contacted me because they heard Trump 
was coming on my podcast,” Rogan started. “And the source of it is a 
fake Trump account on Twitter that said ‘I’m going on the Joe Rogan 
podcast soon.'”
Baker, Rogan’s guest on the episode, commented that he’d even been 
made aware of the rumors and wasn’t sure if it was true or not. “It’s 
not the case,” the host said, as he cleared up the story behind the 
“fake” tweets.

As Rogan referenced, Trump’s appearance on the FULL SEND podcast set 
records for the NELK Boys’ within the first day, and given how big 
Rogan’s show is, it likely would have broken the internet.
Though, it won’t be happening any time soon, if ever as it’s now the 
third time Rogan has shut down the idea of a Trump episode
. So, don’t rush to refresh your Spotify feeds.

title: DYK: Brahmastra’s Alia Bhatt once said ‘when Ranbir Kapoor & I come together, it has to be magical’?
excerpt: Check out all the updates from the trailer launch of this Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt starrer in this entertainment live.&nb After a long wait, the trailer of

content.text:
The Brahmastra trailer, starring Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt, will premiere online today, June 15th. There is no doubt that the fantasy drama directed by Ayan Mukerji is one of the most anticipated movies of the past several years. Fans have been eagerly awaiting the trailer and release of the film ever since the first motion poster was released a few weeks ago. The film stars the couple as well as Amitabh Bachchan, Nagarjuna, and Mouni Roy. Did you know Alia had already expressed her happiness that Brahmastra is the first film in how she and Ranbir would appear together?
1536917850354397184
You read that correctly; this is not a joke. Alia had previously told Pinkvilla that she looks up to Ranbir and that she feels she has a lot to learn from him. She went on to say how excited she is to work with Ranbir for the first time on a film as ambitious as Brahmastra. I couldn't be happier that the first time he and I have worked together is on a picture like this. Once upon a time, I found myself wondering, "When will I get to work with him?" As in, "What do you think is going to happen?" This is what followed. It's been a time since Brahmastra was first imagined, too; five years after Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, to be exact. When I first met Ayan [Mukerji], we instantly connected. When he offered me this role, it was a watershed moment for me. Even though I wasn't who I am now, he still had faith in me. I was quite excited about it, and ever since then, I've looked forward to each day I got to spend on the set. It presents me with fresh challenges every day, and as an actor, it has allowed me complete freedom.

Continuing, Alia stated, "I have always thought that when Ranbir and I come together, it needs to be wonderful and literally, it can't get more magical than this." All this is said in good faith and without any sense of superiority on my part. We're making great strides in that direction.
Both Ranbir and Alia turned to social media yesterday to inform their millions of followers that a trailer will soon be available. Alia claims that she hasn't slept well for a week because of her enthusiasm, while Ranbir says he can't wait to see the trailer's reception.
Brahmastra hits theatres on the 9th of September.

title: The auction of 5G spectrum has been approved by the Cabinet, and services will begin soon.
excerpt: By the end of July, a total of 72 GHz of spectrum with a validity period of 20 years will be auctioned off.

content.text:
According to a statement, India's cabinet has approved a proposal to auction high-speed fifth generation, or 5G, telecom spectrum for 20 years beginning July 26.
According to the government, 72 GHz of spectrum will be auctioned across the low (600 MHz, 700 MHz, 800 MHz, 900 MHz, 1800 MHz, 2100 MHz, 2300 MHz), mid (3300 MHz), and high (26 GHz) frequency bands.
5G telecom services, which are expected to be available soon, will have ten times the speed and capacity of 4G.
The cabinet has also approved so-called private captive networks, which allow enterprises and technology behemoths to have their own networks for machine-to-machine communications, Internet of Things, and artificial intelligence applications in the automotive, healthcare, agriculture, energy, and other sectors.
1536952603451400192
India, which has some of the world's lowest telecom costs, has seen intense competition in the telecom space in recent years, leading to consolidation.
Meanwhile, the government is attempting to develop domestic 5G technology and has incentivized activity in the sector through production-linked incentives for the manufacture of mobile handsets, telecom equipment, and semiconductors, which are expected to aid in the launch of 5G. India will launch 6G services by the end of the decade, according to Prime Minister Narendra Modi.
The companies will benefit from the reforms announced in September 2021, including zero spectrum usage charges, in the upcoming 5G auction. Furthermore, the requirement to submit a financial bank guarantee equal to one annual instalment has been eliminated.
The base prices for spectrum, on the other hand, may be an issue for some operators who had hoped for lower prices.
The cabinet has approved 5G auctions at the reserve prices recommended by India's Telecom Regulatory Authority. In April, TRAI recommended a 39% decrease in the reserve price for the sale of 5G spectrum for mobile services. Some operators proposed a steeper cut.
Successful bidders for the 5G airwaves will not have to pay anything up front. Instead, the government stated that payments for spectrum can be made in 20 equal annual instalments in advance at the start of each year.
Companies can also pay the bid amount in full or in part within 10 days of the final price being announced. Those who choose to pay in 20 equal annual instalments will be charged an interest rate of 7.2 percent, according to the government.
Furthermore, the bidders can surrender the spectrum after 10 years with no future liabilities for balance instalments, according to the document.
On June 15, the Department of Telecom issued a notice inviting applications.
The Telecom Regulatory Authority of India recommended a 39% reduction in the reserve price for the sale of 5G spectrum for mobile services in April.

title: Royal Enfield Hunter 350: A Comprehensive Price Guide Across India
excerpt: Discover the ex-showroom and on-road prices of the Royal Enfield Hunter 350 across various cities in India. Explore the pricing differences between variants and get insights into the additional costs involved in owning this modern classic motorcycle.

content.text:
Royal Enfield Hunter 350: A Comprehensive Review and Price Guide
The Royal Enfield Hunter 350 has taken the motorcycle world by storm, offering a blend of classic charm, modern engineering, and urban agility. In this blog post, we'll dive deep into the Hunter 350, exploring its variants, color options, detailed specifications, and most importantly, the prices in various cities.

Hunter 350 Variants:
The Hunter 350 comes in three distinct variants, each catering to different tastes and preferences:
Retro Factory:
 The base variant, stripped down to its essentials, embracing a raw and minimalistic aesthetic.
Metro Dapper:
 A stylish upgrade with alloy wheels, a center stand, and a choice of more sophisticated color schemes.
Metro Rebel:
 The top-tier variant boasting LED indicators, a premium seat, and the most striking color combinations.

Color Variations:
Each variant offers a unique set of color choices, adding personality and flair to your ride:
Retro Factory:
 Factory Black, Factory Silver
Metro Dapper:
 Dapper White, Dapper Ash, Dapper Grey
Metro Rebel:
 Rebel Black, Rebel Blue, Rebel Red

Specifications:
Specification
Details
Engine
349.34 cc, Air-Oil Cooled, Single Cylinder
Power
20.2 bhp @ 6100 rpm
Torque
27 Nm @ 4000 rpm
Transmission
5-speed
Fuel System
Electronic Fuel Injection
Brakes (Front/Rear)
Disc/Disc
Suspension (Front)
Telescopic 41 mm forks
Suspension (Rear)
Twin shocks with 6-step adjustable preload
Tyre Size (Front)
110/70-17
Tyre Size (Rear)
140/70-17

Additional Details:
Ex-Showroom Price:
 This is the base price of the motorcycle without any additional charges like RTO, insurance, and accessories.
On-Road Price:
 This is the final price you pay to the dealer, including the ex-showroom price, RTO (Road Tax and Registration), insurance, and any other mandatory charges.
Variations:
 The on-road price may vary slightly between dealerships within the same city due to differences in handling charges and local taxes.
Insurance:
 The insurance component can also vary based on the type of insurance you choose (comprehensive or third-party) and the IDV (Insured Declared Value).


Conclusion:
The Royal Enfield Hunter 350 has successfully captured the essence of a modern-classic motorcycle, offering a delightful riding experience for both urban commuters and weekend adventurers. With its diverse variants, vibrant colors, and competitive pricing, the Hunter 350 stands as a compelling choice for motorcycle enthusiasts.
Disclaimer:
 The prices mentioned are approximate and may vary depending on the dealership and any ongoing promotions. It's always recommended to contact your nearest Royal Enfield dealership for the most accurate and up-to-date pricing information.

title: IPL 2025: Riyan Parag Smashes 6 Consecutive Sixes, Joins Yuvraj Singh and Kieron Pollard in Elite Club
excerpt: Riyan Parag set Eden Gardens alight in IPL 2025, hitting six consecutive sixes against KKR’s Moeen Ali and Varun Chakravarthy. His explosive 95 off 48 balls revived Rajasthan Royals’ chase of 207, matching feats by Yuvraj Singh and Kieron Pollard. Relive the historic moment and explore its significance!

content.text:
IPL 2025: Riyan Parag Smashes 6 Consecutive Sixes, Joins Yuvraj Singh and Kieron Pollard in Elite Club
In a electrifying moment at Eden Gardens on May 4, 2025, Rajasthan Royals captain 
Riyan Parag
 turned the tide against Kolkata Knight Riders (KKR) in IPL 2025. Parag smashed 
six consecutive sixes
, a feat that places him alongside cricketing giants like Yuvraj Singh and Kieron Pollard. This explosive performance not only revived Rajasthan’s innings but also set social media ablaze with excitement.
The Match: KKR vs RR at Eden Gardens
Chasing a daunting 207-run target, Rajasthan Royals found themselves reeling at 72/5 in the 8th over. Enter Riyan Parag, who took charge when his team needed him most. Facing KKR’s Moeen Ali in the 13th over, Parag unleashed a barrage of sixes that left the crowd roaring and commentators speechless.


Ball-by-Ball: Parag’s Six Sixes Breakdown


Here’s how Parag made history with six sixes in back-to-back balls:
12.2
: Moeen Ali bowls flatter and full on the pads. Parag whips it over deep square leg for a flat six, bringing up his fifty with a calm raise of the bat.
12.3
: Flighted and full on off, Parag launches it over long on for another towering six.
12.4
: Moeen switches to around the wicket, but Parag swipes a full delivery on leg over deep square leg again.
12.5
: A loopy ball on middle, Parag clears his front leg and smashes it high over long on.
12.6
: Quicker and full outside off, Parag extends his arms and tonks it over long off—five sixes in the over!
13.2
: Varun Chakravarthy floats one full around middle, and Parag nails a reverse sweep over deep point for his sixth consecutive six.
This 32-run over against Moeen Ali, followed by the sixth six off Chakravarthy, marked one of the most unforgettable sequences in IPL history.
A Rare Feat in IPL History
Hitting five sixes in a single over is a rare achievement in the IPL. Here’s the elite list Parag joined:
Chris Gayle vs. Rahul Sharma (2012)
Rahul Tewatia vs. Sheldon Cottrell (2020)
Ravindra Jadeja vs. Harshal Patel (2021)
Rinku Singh vs. Yash Dayal (2023)
Riyan Parag vs. Moeen Ali (2025)
But Parag went a step further with six consecutive sixes across two overs, echoing the legendary feats of Yuvraj Singh (2007 T20 World Cup), Kieron Pollard (2021 T20I), and Dipendra Singh Airee (on two occasions). While no one has hit six sixes in a single IPL over, Parag’s performance is as close as it gets.
Parag’s Knock: 95 Runs of Pure Brilliance
Parag’s onslaught ended in the 17th over when he was dismissed for 95—his highest IPL score yet. Packed with 10 sixes and 4 fours, his 48-ball innings kept Rajasthan alive in the chase. Though the match outcome remains pending, Parag’s heroics will be the talk of IPL 2025 for years to come.
For live updates and scorecards from IPL 2025, check out 
urtechy.com/ipl-2025
.
Why This Moment Matters
Parag’s six-in-six isn’t just about brute force—it’s a showcase of skill, composure, and clutch performance under pressure. At a time when Rajasthan Royals were on the brink, their captain delivered a career-defining knock that could signal his arrival as a T20 superstar.
This feat also draws parallels to T20I history, where only three players have hit six consecutive sixes:
Yuvraj Singh
 vs. Stuart Broad (2007)
Kieron Pollard
 vs. Sri Lanka (2021)
Dipendra Singh Airee
 vs. Qatar and Mongolia
Explore more iconic T20 moments at 
blog.urtechy.com/top-t20-performances
.
A Night to Remember
Riyan Parag’s six consecutive sixes lit up Eden Gardens and cemented his place in cricketing lore. As IPL 2025 unfolds, fans will be watching to see if he can replicate this magic. For the latest IPL news, stats, and analysis, head to 
urtechy.com
.

Image: Riyan Parag’s explosive sixes against KKR (Credit: AP Photo)

title: Beyond the Headlines: 5 Unseen Truths About the Bondi Beach Terror Attack
excerpt: A deeper analysis of the Bondi Beach terror attack, examining intelligence failures, rising antisemitism, gun control gaps, civilian heroism, and Australia’s evolving security challenges.

content.text:
Introduction: The Echoes of Tragedy
The horrific terror attack at Bondi Beach on December 14, 2025, which left 
16 people dead (including one gunman)
 and 
43 injured
, sent a shockwave of grief and disbelief across Australia and the world. In the aftermath of such profound violence, the immediate focus is rightly on the victims, their families, and the raw pain of the community. Yet, as the initial horror subsides, a deeper understanding of the event is not only possible but essential to collective resilience.
This article moves beyond the headlines to examine the 
unseen truths
 this tragedy reveals about Australian society, national security, and civic responsibility. The Bondi area has now endured 
two distinct mass-casualty events in less than two years
: the Westfield stabbings of April 2024, an act of pathological violence, and the 2025 terror attack, a deliberate act of ideological hatred. Understanding the crucial differences between these attacks is the first step toward making sense of the violence—and the systemic vulnerabilities each exposed.
By examining the context, failures, methods, heroism, and consequences of the Bondi Beach attack, we can identify 
five critical takeaways
 that offer a more grounded and necessary perspective on this defining moment in Australian history.
1. The Attack Was a Symptom, Not a Standalone Event
To comprehend the Bondi Beach attack, a difficult truth must be acknowledged: it did not occur in a vacuum. Major acts of ideological violence are rarely spontaneous. They are typically the culmination of 
long-simmering social fractures and security failures
.
The events of December 14 were foreshadowed by a series of escalating warning signs that, when viewed together, form a clear causal chain:
A national rise in antisemitism:
 Since October 2023, Australia had seen a documented increase in attacks against Jewish communities, creating a climate of fear and vulnerability.
An elevated national threat level:
 In August 2024, ASIO raised the national terrorism threat level from 
possible
 to 
probable
, citing political violence and community tensions linked to the war in Gaza.
Localized warnings:
 In the weeks preceding the attack, antisemitic graffiti appeared across North Bondi—an explicit local manifestation of the hatred that would soon turn lethal.
This context dismantles any narrative that the attack was unpredictable or isolated. Instead, it illustrates a direct progression from ideological vitriol to organized violence. As one community leader warned, the trajectory was both familiar and ignored:
“We have warned for years that the unceasing antisemitic vitriol on our streets would evolve into antisemitic violence if left unchecked. We have warned that verbal abuse becomes graffiti, becomes arson, becomes physical violence, becomes murder.”
— 
Colin Rubenstein
, Executive Director, Australia/Israel & Jewish Affairs Council
Unchecked public hatred provided the ideological fuel, while an elevated threat level confirmed the danger—creating a permissive environment for catastrophic failure.
2. A Known Threat Slipped Through the Cracks


Public discourse after terror attacks often focuses on ideology. Equally important, however, is scrutiny of the 
systems designed to prevent such events
. One of the most sobering truths of the Bondi Beach attack is that security agencies had prior knowledge of one perpetrator—yet failed to intervene.
The younger assailant, 
24-year-old Naveed Akram
, had been known to ASIO since 2019 but was assessed as 
“not an immediate threat.”
 The dissonance between that assessment and the outcome exposes a critical weakness in counter-terrorism prioritization.
Australia now faces a dual challenge. Security systems must anticipate:
Ideological radicalization
, as seen in the 2025 terror attack.
Pathological violence
, as seen in the 2024 Westfield stabbings.
These are fundamentally different threats, yet both can produce mass casualties. ASIO Director-General Mike Burgess has repeatedly warned that modern terrorism increasingly takes the form of 
small-scale, rapidly mobilized individuals or micro-networks
. The Bondi Beach attack demonstrates how dangerously short the gap can be between intelligence assessment and mass violence.
3. The Attackers’ Methods Revealed a Terrifying Level of Planning
The tactics used in an attack reveal the perpetrators’ intent. The Bondi Beach shooting was not an impulsive act—it was a 
deliberately engineered operation
 designed for maximum lethality.
Key elements of the attackers’ methods included:
Coordinated assailants:
 A father and son working together, firing from an elevated footbridge to target crowds below.
High-powered firearms:
 Including at least one bolt-action rifle, enabling sustained and accurate fire.
Attempted secondary attacks:
 NSW Police later discovered suspected homemade bombs and improvised explosive devices (IEDs) in a vehicle linked to one shooter.
The presence of IEDs is especially chilling. Vehicle-based explosives are a hallmark of 
international terror tactics
, often intended to target first responders after the initial attack. Their discovery indicates intent to cause casualties on a far larger scale than ultimately occurred.
The result was the 
deadliest terror incident in Australian history
 and the second-deadliest mass shooting since Port Arthur in 1996. The level of planning underscores both the severity of the threat and the cost of intelligence failure.
4. Civilian Heroism Is Powerful—but Incomplete—Protection
In the earliest moments of public attacks, outcomes are often shaped not by policy but by people. As in 2024, the 2025 attack revealed extraordinary 
civilian courage
, alongside a troubling reliance on chance.
During the shooting, an unarmed bystander tackled one of the gunmen from behind, wrestled away his weapon, and turned it on the attacker. He was shot twice in the process. His intervention almost certainly saved lives.
Prime Minister Anthony Albanese acknowledged the act plainly:
“These Australians are heroes. And their bravery has saved lives.”
— 
Prime Minister Anthony Albanese
The moment echoed the 2024 Bondi Junction stabbings, where 
Damien Guerot
 used a bollard to confront a knife-wielding attacker. In both cases, lives were saved by individuals acting on instinct—not training.
This pattern exposes a systemic issue: 
reliance on luck
. A resilient security posture cannot depend on the presence of an exceptionally brave bystander. It must include 
formal active-bystander training
, public readiness education, and integrated emergency response frameworks. Heroism is invaluable—but it should be supported, not assumed.
5. The Tragedy Reignited a National Reckoning on Gun Control
Australia’s post–Port Arthur gun reforms have long been considered world-leading. The Bondi Beach terror attack shattered any remaining complacency and forced the first serious national re-evaluation of firearm laws in decades.
Prime Minister Albanese convened the National Cabinet and proposed 
significant tightening
 of existing regulations. Key measures under consideration include:
Restricting firearm ownership to 
Australian citizens only
.
Accelerating a 
national firearms register
 for unified oversight.
Limiting the number of firearms an individual may own.
Ending “in perpetuity” licenses in favor of 
ongoing suitability audits
.
These reforms represent a strategic pivot. Intelligence cannot always identify radicalization in time. When prevention fails upstream, 
controlling access to weapons of mass harm
 becomes the most reliable safeguard. The proposals aim to close the gaps that allowed a licensed owner to participate in a sophisticated terror plot.
What This Moment Demands
The Bondi Beach terror attack was not a singular rupture but the outcome of converging pressures: rising ideological hatred, intelligence blind spots, tactical sophistication, and systemic overreliance on chance heroism. It was met with courage—but also with overdue policy reckoning.
The paired tragedies of 2024 and 2025 in the same community reveal a hard truth. Australia now faces 
two parallel threats
: organized ideological terrorism and unpredictable pathological violence. One demands robust national security; the other requires effective mental health intervention. Both require an informed, engaged public.
The question this moment leaves behind is not abstract. It is practical and urgent: 
how must government, institutions, and citizens recalibrate shared responsibility to build a society that is not only secure, but resilient to threats from both without and within?

title: Bigg Boss 15: Is Pratik Sehajpal going to emerge as the winner? Gauahar Khan, Kamya Panjabi, Kushal Tandon tweet in support of the young man
excerpt: Bigg Boss 15: Is Pratik Sehajpal going to emerge as the winner? There is an immense outpour of celeb support from Gauahar Khan, Kamya Panjabi and Others for the young man

content.text:
Bigg Boss 15 will see its finale next week. Tejasswi Prakash, Karan Kundrra, Rakhi Sawant, Rashami Desai, Pratik Sehajpal are the contestants who have the ticket to finale. While many feel that one amongst Karan Kundrra, Tejasswi Prakash or Shamita Shetty will take home the trophy, the celebrity support is for Pratik Sehajpal. The young man qualified from Bigg Boss OTT to Salman Khan's show. As a reality show contestant, he has shown various sides like anger, love and friendship. Pratik Sehajpal has also been aggressive on the show which is a prerequisite for a Bigg Boss contestant. People who have come as guests on the show have also praised his game.




But if there is anything that bogs him down it is the fact that he has tried to blow up situations. This is why people have trolled him as a sympathy seeker, which is not a good things.

title: Bigg Boss 15: Umar Riaz Reveals The Reason Reason Behind His Animosity With Tejasswi Prakash, “She Changed Drastically…”
excerpt: Bigg Boss 15 has witnessed a lot of change in equations. While Tejasswi Prakash and Umar Riaz seemed to be bonding during...

content.text:
Bigg Boss 15 has witnessed a lot of change in equations. While Tejasswi Prakash and Umar Riaz seemed to be bonding during the start of the show, things turned upside down soon after. Despite the fact that she was her best friend’s girlfriend, the evicted contestant couldn’t get himself to like her. Scroll below for the actual reasons!
As most know, Umar was ousted from the show over his physical aggression with Pratik Sehajpal. However, his fans had majorly called out Salman Khan and the show ‘unfair’ over their decision. A huge controversy was even irked when Geeta Kapur questioned his profession and called him a violent doctor.




Umar Riaz has now opened up about his equation with Tejasswi Prakash and said she doesn’t matter to him. The evicted Bigg Boss 15 contestant told ETimes TV, “To be honest, what Tejasswi says about me doesn’t affect me at all. Because I don’t consider her my friend. If my people Karan Kundrra, Rajiv Adatia or 
Rashami Desai
 say something about me that will really affect me or hurt me. But honestly, what Tejasswi has to say about me honestly doesn’t matter to me. She never mattered to me in the game and will never matter to me in my life too”




Umar Riaz added that he doesn’t like Tejasswi Prakash because of her arrogance. “I never had any personal problems with 
Tejasswi
 and in fact we bonded quite well initially. I supported her and took her to the VIP room and that time she was not even my friend, I did it because she was Karan Kundrra’s girlfriend. For me a friend’s friend is my friend. But when her behaviour started changing I had problems with her. When she got a few powers her attitude changed. I was very humble and down to earth but she changed drastically and talked to others with authority and I did not appreciate this. I felt everyone was equal in the show and just because I have a VIP tag it doesn’t mean I need to get rude with people,” he concluded.
explosive Interview of Umar Riaz



1480254297031905280

Do you agree with Umar Riaz? Share with us in the comments section.

title: Where to find Bridge Keycard on Olympus in Apex Legends
excerpt: Apex Legends players exploring Olympus in Season 12 will hit a hurdle when trying to access the Icarus Bridge without a Keycard. Here we show you exactly where the Bridge Keycard can be found in the game.

content.text:
Apex Legends players exploring Olympus in Season 12 will hit a hurdle when trying to access the Icarus Bridge without a Keycard. Here we show you exactly where the Bridge Keycard can be found in the game.
Like other vaulted entryways in Apex, players need a key to access these high-tier loot zones that can generally be found lying somewhere nearby.
People dropping onto Olympus will be crowding these areas, so it’s best to know exactly what you’re looking for and where in order to get ahead of the lobby.
Getting access to the Icarus ship’s valuable loot will surely attract attention so here’s how to make sure your team is the first to find the keycard.
Olympus Icarus ship Bridge Keycard


Apex Legends players will need a Bridge Keycard to access Icarus’ high-tier loot.
Inside the Icarus ship, Apex players will be greeted with a gruesome scene as bodies litter the floor.
Luckily for players, though, 
finding the bodies
 means you’re on the right track for a Bridge Keycard.
While it doesn’t always spawn in the same place, Bridge Keycards can be found o
n the floor near one of the fallen scientists
 on the ship.

Once you locate it, add it to your inventory like any other ground loot item. Once you stash the item away, the bridge location will be added to your map.


It’ll take a couple of seconds to open the Icarus Bridge, so beware of campers who could be laying in wait to strike unsuspecting looters.

title: Anish Giri: ‘I have had it all in Wijk aan Zee’
excerpt: Wijk aan Zee is where most of my memorable moments in my chess career have happened.

content.text:
Wijk aan Zee is where most of my memorable moments in my chess career have happened. I have had it all there, made my GM title (2009), shared first place (2018, 2021), last place (2012), beaten Magnus Carlsen as a 16 year old kid (2011), lost 5 games in a row (2012). Every January, time and again, together with my friends and colleagues we are back in Wijk aan Zee, ready to battle it out in front of the home crowd in De Moriaan.


The atmosphere at the event is always special. The tournament has a rich history, and it is a special moment for every chess player to be taking part in this historic event. The village breaths chess every January and the fans, chess amateurs add special value to the tournament. Although 2021 and 2022 has to be played in the lockdown, I am still glad the tournament is as strong as ever and I do hope in 2023, we will celebrate the 85th edition (my 15th!) all in one hall, together with the amateur groups.
Enjoy the games!
Anish Giri
Ambassador Tata Steel Chess Tournament

title: U.S.-China Trade Truce and Trump’s Drug Price Cuts: What It Means for Markets and Policy
excerpt: On May 12, 2025, the U.S. and China reached a 90-day trade truce, slashing tariffs to calm global tensions. On the same day, President Trump signed a bold executive order to cut prescription drug prices by up to 80%. This blog dives into the implications of both moves, how markets responded, and what lies ahead for global trade, healthcare, and fintech sectors.

content.text:
U.S.-China Trade Truce and Trump's Drug Pricing Reform: A Global Economic Turning Point


By 
Urtechy.com
 – Your Guide to Fintech, Policy, and Markets
🚨 Key Developments at a Glance
On 
May 12, 2025
, the U.S. and China announced a 
90-day trade truce
, dramatically lowering tariffs to reduce economic tension.
China will reduce tariffs on U.S. goods from 
125% to 10%
, while the U.S. cuts tariffs on Chinese goods from 
145% to 30%
, effective 
May 14, 2025
.
Simultaneously, 
President Trump signed an executive order
 to cut 
prescription drug prices by 30–80%
 under a "Most Favored Nation" policy.
Both policies offer near-term relief, but 
long-term effects remain uncertain
 due to legal and diplomatic complexities.
🧾 U.S.-China Trade Truce: Details and Implications
1920529165293326813
Following intense negotiations in 
Geneva
, the U.S. and China reached a temporary agreement to ease economic tensions. This 90-day trade truce is expected to take effect on 
May 14, 2025
, and aims to:
Rollback Tariffs
:
The 
U.S.
 will reduce tariffs on Chinese imports from 
145% to 30%
.
China
 will slash tariffs on U.S. goods from 
125% to 10%
.
Suspend Non-Tariff Barriers
:
China has also agreed to lift recent restrictions on exports of 
rare-earth minerals
, key to global tech manufacturing.
Facilitate Further Talks
:
A rotating negotiation forum between the U.S., China, and neutral countries is planned to draft a permanent framework.
📈 Market Reactions
The global financial markets 
responded enthusiastically
:
S&P 500
: +3.2%
Nasdaq
: +4.4%
Dow Jones
: +1,100 points
Oil and commodity prices surged amid hopes of economic normalization.
Even retail investor sentiment in India mirrored this optimism. As covered in our blog on 
record ₹26,632 crore SIP inflows
, Indian investors showed growing confidence in equity markets, echoing global trends.
However, analysts remain cautious. Core issues like 
fentanyl trafficking
, 
intellectual property rights
, and the 
$1.2 trillion U.S. trade deficit with China
 remain unresolved. Some experts argue that 
90 days may not be sufficient
 for a lasting resolution.
1921943186009714885
💊 Trump’s Drug Pricing Reform: Bold but Controversial
In a surprise move, President Trump signed an executive order mandating 
prescription drug price cuts of 30–80%
 under a new "
Most Favored Nation (MFN)
" pricing strategy. This reform targets both 
Medicare
 and 
Medicaid
 spending, with the following features:
🧬 Key Mechanisms
MFN Benchmarking
:
U.S. prices will be pegged to the 
lowest rates
 paid by countries like 
Germany, Canada, and the UK
.
30-Day Compliance Window
:
Drugmakers have a month to lower prices voluntarily. Failure to do so will trigger 
government-imposed caps
.
Direct-to-Consumer Initiatives
:
The Department of Health and Human Services (HHS), led by 
Robert F. Kennedy Jr.
, is authorized to facilitate 
bulk buying programs
 and 
import cheaper alternatives
.
Trump’s Statement
:
“Americans are tired of getting ripped off. This order will save 
trillions
 and finally bring fairness to drug pricing,” said Trump on Truth Social.
1921975114196742548
💼 Industry Reactions & Legal Challenges
🧪 Pharmaceutical Industry Response
PhRMA CEO Stephen Ubl
 called it “a bad deal for American patients,” citing risks to 
R&D investment
.
Companies like 
Merck
 and 
Pfizer
 initially saw stock dips but later rebounded as the market assessed implementation risks.
⚖️ Legal Experts Weigh In
Paul Kim
, a healthcare attorney, stated:
This isn’t the first attempt either; a 
similar MFN proposal was blocked
 in 2021, leading to doubts over this version’s survivability in court.
🔍 Comparative Snapshot
Aspect
U.S.-China Trade Deal
Drug Price Reform
Date Announced
May 12, 2025
May 12, 2025
Duration
90 Days (temporary truce)
Immediate, with 30-day compliance period
Policy Mechanism
Tariff rollback, trade negotiations
MFN pricing, direct HHS enforcement
Market Reaction
Positive surge in global stocks
Mixed; initial pharma dip, later recovery
Challenges Ahead
Complex trade deficits, fentanyl crisis
Legal hurdles, industry pushback
Wider Impact
Global supply chains, inflation
Healthcare affordability, innovation risk
🌐 Broader Implications for Fintech and Policy
These announcements aren’t isolated. They ripple across markets and industries. Fintech platforms like 
urtechy.com
 track such macro-level developments and translate them into actionable insights.
The growing role of 
AI
 in shaping global policy and development is evident too. Our blog on 
AI in Modern Coding Education
 explores how education and software development are evolving to align with these rapid changes.
Meanwhile, as companies like OpenAI explore IPO opportunities (as discussed in 
OpenAI-Microsoft IPO Talks 2025
), the tech and policy landscape continues to shift, blurring lines between governance, innovation, and economic strategy.
🧠 Final Thoughts
Both the 
U.S.-China trade truce
 and 
Trump’s drug pricing order
 reflect ambitious efforts to resolve pressing global issues. However:
The 
trade deal
, while promising, is a 
band-aid solution
. Real progress hinges on resolving deeper geopolitical and economic rifts.
The 
drug reform order
, though bold, faces 
legal and industrial resistance
. Its success depends on whether the government can enforce compliance and withstand lawsuits.
As these complex developments evolve, expect turbulence in global markets, politics, and healthcare.
👉 For real-time updates and analysis on such events, visit 
urtechy.com
 – your trusted source for fintech, market trends, AI news, and public policy.

title: OpenAI and Microsoft in IPO Talks: What It Means for the Future of AI
excerpt: OpenAI is reportedly negotiating with Microsoft to revise their multibillion-dollar partnership, potentially paving the way for an IPO. As the AI giant eyes a public offering, the talks could reshape AI innovation, investment strategies, and regulatory oversight in 2025 and beyond.

content.text:
Key Points
Negotiations Underway:
 OpenAI is reportedly negotiating with Microsoft to revise their partnership, potentially paving the way for an IPO—specifics remain unclear.
Investment Trade-Off:
 Microsoft, having invested over $13 billion in OpenAI, may accept reduced equity in exchange for extended access to advanced AI technologies beyond 2030.
Mission vs. Profit:
 The shift from nonprofit roots to a for-profit public benefit corporation raises concerns about OpenAI’s founding mission and could reshape the AI landscape.
Market & Regulatory Impact:
 The outcome will influence AI innovation, investor opportunities, and regulatory scrutiny; no IPO timeline has been confirmed as of May 13, 2025.
Background
OpenAI, creator of ChatGPT, has been at the forefront of artificial intelligence innovation since its founding in 2015 by visionaries such as Elon Musk, Sam Altman, and others. Initially established as a nonprofit, OpenAI’s mission was to ensure AGI benefits all of humanity. However, to attract necessary capital for high-cost research, it transitioned to a capped-profit model in 2019. That same year, Microsoft invested $1 billion, eventually increasing its total investment to more than $13 billion. This strategic alliance enabled significant progress in AI technologies and their integration into tools like Azure, Bing, and Microsoft 365.
Explore how AI is transforming coding education in our post on 
AI in Modern Coding Education
.
Current Negotiations
On May 11, 2025, reports from 
Reuters
 and the 
Financial Times
 revealed that OpenAI and Microsoft are engaged in crucial discussions aimed at restructuring their partnership. The goal: enable OpenAI’s transformation into a for-profit public benefit corporation, a structure necessary to proceed with an IPO. Microsoft currently holds unique rights to OpenAI’s technology and a revenue-sharing agreement valid through 2030.
Sources indicate that Microsoft may accept a reduction in its equity stake in return for extended access to OpenAI’s future innovations, including breakthroughs in generative AI and gaming technology. These talks remain confidential, and no timeline or definitive terms have been disclosed.
Read more about game-changing AI in our feature on 
Google AI Conquers Classic Game Milestone
.
Implications
For OpenAI
An IPO would open doors to vast funding opportunities, boosting its capacity to innovate and challenge competitors like xAI and Anthropic. It would also offer liquidity to employees and early backers, which aligns with a broader trend in capital markets.
See how investment interest is rising in 
Record ₹26,632 crore SIP Inflows – April 2025
.
However, critics warn this could compromise OpenAI’s founding ethos. Prioritizing profits may impact long-term public trust, particularly if ethical AI development takes a backseat to investor demands.
For Microsoft
By prioritizing sustained access to OpenAI’s technology over equity control, Microsoft positions itself as a long-term AI leader. The strategy strengthens its offerings across cloud services, productivity tools, and enterprise solutions. Nonetheless, diluted equity could lessen Microsoft’s influence in OpenAI’s governance, especially post-IPO.
Industry & Regulation
If successful, OpenAI’s IPO might spark a wave of public listings from AI startups, intensifying competition in a market projected to surpass $400 billion by 2027. At the same time, regulators may scrutinize the move given ongoing concerns around monopolistic behavior and the ethical deployment of AI.
Conclusion
The ongoing OpenAI–Microsoft negotiations are more than a business realignment—they represent a major inflection point in the evolution of AI. While the talks aim to balance innovation and commercialization, they also raise questions about ethics, regulation, and the future of human-centric AI.
Whether OpenAI goes public soon or not, this evolving story is one to watch closely, with implications that could ripple across the tech world for years to come.

title: How did BGMI star Mortal celebrate 7 million subscribers on YouTube?
excerpt: He was livestreaming on the platform as he hosted a watch party for the PMGC 2021 Grand Finals. In the stream, Mortal, along with his friends and colleagues at S8UL, cheered for GodLike Esports (the only team representing the Indian esports contingent in the Global Championship).

content.text:
BGMI
 has given the Indian gaming community several stars who have become massive names in the esports community. Naman "Mortal" Mathur is one such cult figure amongst mobile gamers in India.
Mortal created his channel in 2016, but it was the introduction of 
PUBG Mobile
 in 2018 that made him a superstar in the community. After a roller-coaster of a ride on YouTube, Mortal finally completed 7 million subscribers on the platform.
The 25-year-old lad from Mumbai is one of the biggest names in gaming as he finished second in the "Streamer of the Year 2021" category at the recently organized Esports Awards.
His rise in popularity is mainly due to his brilliant performance in esports tournaments, and his clutches in livestreams and gameplay videos that he uploads on YouTube.


BGMI star Mortal does a massive giveaway and gets his head shaved as a celebration for hitting 7 million subscribers on YouTube
Mortal finally reached 7 million subscribers on his primary YouTube channel last night making him one of the most popular gamers in the country.
He was livestreaming on the platform as he hosted a watch party for the 
PMGC 2021 Grand Finals
. In the stream, Mortal, along with his friends and colleagues at S8UL, cheered for GodLike Esports (the only team representing the Indian esports contingent in the Global Championship).
Mortal celebrated the occasion by cutting a cake and suggested that all the other confectionaries be divided among poor people on the streets. He even announced that a bigger giveaway would be made when his channel reaches 8 million subscribers.
Furthermore, he continued the tradition prevalent amongst members of S8UL, and got his head clean-shaved on livestream. Before ending the stream, he promised his fans that he would bring in more entertaining content from BGMI and other games.


On January 21, when Mortal began with the watch party, he had announced a massive giveaway for his subscribers, members and moderators on his channel, that would be hosted on the completion of 7 million subscribers on his channel.
Therefore, when he finally reached the milestone, he completed the giveaway of iPhones, AirPods, Jordans and BGMI UCs.
1478692399446519811

. In the stream, Mortal, along with his friends and colleagues at S8UL, cheered for GodLike Esports (the only team representing the Indian esports contingent in the Global Championship).

Mortal celebrated the occasion by cutting a cake and suggested that all the other confectionaries be divided among poor people on the streets. He even announced that a bigger giveaway would be made when his channel reaches 8 million subscribers.

Furthermore, he continued the tradition prevalent amongst members of S8UL, and got his head clean-shaved on livestream. Before ending the stream, he promised his fans that he would bring in more entertaining content from BGMI and other games.

On January 21, when Mortal began with the watch party, he had announced a massive giveaway for his subscribers, members and moderators on his channel, that would be hosted on the completion of 7 million subscribers on his channel.
Therefore, when he finally reached the milestone, he completed the giveaway of iPhones, AirPods, Jordans and BGMI UCs.

title: Pokimane sparks YouTube rumors as Twitch contract ends
excerpt: Superstar streamer Pokimane’s time with Twitch may be coming to an end, as she announced that her contract with the Amazon-owned platform is read more..

content.text:
Superstar streamer Pokimane’s time with Twitch may be coming to an end, as she announced that her contract with the Amazon-owned platform is officially over. Without revealing whether she will re-sign or move to YouTube, she has teased the date for her upcoming decision.
Imane ‘Pokimane’ Anys is no average content creator and the place where she conducts her business matters to a lot of people. On Twitch, where she has streamed exclusively under contract for two years, she has over 8.9 million followers.
Across both her Twitter profiles and her Instagram account, Poki has over 12.5 million followers. And, of interest to those wondering where she may stream next, she already has 7-plus million followers on her two YouTube channels.
In a January 31 tweet, the incredibly popular streamer announced that her Twitch contract has officially ended.
Further, fans will need to wait over a week to find out where her “next chapter” will be written.
Pokimane announces end of Twitch contract
1488247061954785280
In the new tweet, Poki explained that her “wild two years” with Twitch are coming to a close as the platform’s exclusive contract ends. Accompanying the announcement, she included a happy, but sad smiling, crying emoji.
Teasing her “next chapter,” she also said that fans will be able to see her again on February 8.
While this isn’t clearly linked to any streaming platform, many are wondering if this means a switch to streaming on YouTube.
Pokimane leaving Twitch for YouTube Gaming?
1488248220241252352
Just five minutes after Poki’s tweet, YouTube Gaming put out a cryptic message of their own that has deepened speculation about the streamer’s next plans. In the past, 
Poki has made jokes about YouTube’s streaming offerings
, but nothing venomous enough to suggest she wouldn’t join the wave.

title: Virat Kohli Retires from Test Cricket: A Legacy That Will Inspire Generations
excerpt: On May 12, 2025, cricket legend Virat Kohli announced his retirement from Test cricket, marking the end of an era. This article explores Kohli's remarkable Test career, the reasons behind his retirement, global reactions, and his lasting impact on Indian cricket.

content.text:
On May 12, 2025, the world of cricket witnessed the end of an era. 
Virat Kohli
, the iconic Indian cricketer, announced his retirement from Test cricket through a heartfelt social media post, leaving fans in shock and admiration. A journey that began in June 2011 concluded with this emotional farewell, but Kohli's legacy in Test cricket will continue to inspire generations.
As one of India’s most successful Test captains, Kohli’s influence on the sport transcended mere statistics. His passion, aggression, and leadership reshaped Indian cricket, making him a global icon. In this article, we explore Kohli’s illustrious Test career, his reasons for retiring, and his lasting impact on the sport.
For 
Live Cricket Updates
, check out 
Live Cricket Updates
.
Virat Kohli’s Test Career: A Snapshot of Greatness


Debut and Early Struggles
Virat Kohli made his Test debut in June 2011 against the West Indies in Kingston. The journey wasn’t smooth initially, with Kohli struggling in his first few matches, managing just 76 runs across five innings. However, these early setbacks became the foundation for his relentless pursuit of excellence.
Rise to Stardom: Memorable Performances
Kohli’s breakthrough moment came during the 2012 Adelaide Test, where he scored his maiden Test century, a resilient 116 against Australia. This innings marked the beginning of his dominance. In the 2014-15 tour of Australia, Kohli announced his arrival as a superstar with 692 runs, including four centuries, in a single series.
Captaincy Era: Transforming Indian Test Cricket
Taking over the Test captaincy from MS Dhoni in 2014, Kohli transformed the Indian Test team into a fearless, aggressive unit. Under his leadership:
India became the No. 1 Test team in the ICC rankings for 42 consecutive months.
He led India to their first-ever Test series win in Australia (2018-19).
The team reached two World Test Championship finals (2019 and 2023).

https://www.instagram.com/p/DJiwQm0RbiM/

Statistical Highlights of Kohli’s Test Career
Category
Statistics
Matches Played
123
Runs Scored
9,230
Batting Average
46.85
Centuries
30 (including 7 double centuries)
Highest Score
254*
Matches as Captain
68
Wins as Captain
40

These numbers tell a story of a player who was not just a run machine but a leader who changed the face of Indian cricket.
The Emotional Farewell: Kohli’s Retirement Announcement
The Heartfelt Social Media Post
On May 12, 2025, Kohli posted an emotional message on Instagram, reflecting on his 14-year journey in Test cricket:
“It’s been 14 years since I first wore the baggy blue in Test cricket. Honestly, I never imagined the journey this format would take me on. It’s tested me, shaped me, and taught me lessons I’ll carry for life.”
This post was a heartfelt goodbye, capturing his love for the format that defined his career.

https://www.instagram.com/p/DJjH0kFMj3K/

Significance of #269: The Test Cap Number
Kohli’s hashtag “#269” represented his Test cap number, a tribute to his identity as India’s 269th Test cricketer. This subtle yet profound touch showed his deep connection with the format.
Global Reactions to Kohli’s Retirement
The cricketing world reacted with an outpouring of admiration for Kohli:
Roger Binny (BCCI President):
 “Virat’s leadership changed India’s mindset. His name will be remembered among the greatest in Test history.”
Nasser Hussain (Former England Captain):
 “He wasn’t just about the numbers. His aura and passion were unparalleled.”
Cheteshwar Pujara (Teammate):
 “Virat lived for Test cricket. His intensity was unmatched.”
These tributes highlighted Kohli’s influence as a player and a leader.
For more insights, read about 
IPL 2025: Riyan Parag Hits Six Consecutive Sixes
.
Why Did Kohli Retire? Analyzing the Key Factors
1. Declining Form in Test Matches
Kohli’s last Test century came in November 2024.
His average dropped to 32.56 over the past two years.
2. BCCI’s Family Policy and Its Impact
BCCI’s new policy limited family stays on overseas tours, affecting Kohli’s personal preferences.
3. Prioritizing ODI and T20 Formats
With the 2027 ODI World Cup approaching, Kohli may focus on shorter formats.
4. Physical and Mental Fatigue
At 36, Kohli may have found the physical demands of Test cricket challenging.
Virat Kohli’s Impact on Indian Cricket
1. Changing India’s Overseas Mindset
Kohli led India to historic series wins in Australia (2018-19), redefining how the team performed abroad.
2. Elevating Fitness Standards
Kohli’s fitness regimen became a benchmark for Indian players.
3. Leadership Legacy
With 40 Test wins, he is India’s most successful Test captain.
What’s Next for Virat Kohli?
A continued focus on ODI cricket, with an eye on the 2027 World Cup.
Potential roles in mentoring or commentary.
The Future of Indian Test Cricket Without Kohli
Captaincy Options:
 Shubman Gill is a frontrunner.
Young Stars:
 Yashasvi Jaiswal and Ruturaj Gaikwad may replace Kohli.
Conclusion: A Legend Bows Out
Virat Kohli’s retirement from Test cricket marks the end of an unforgettable chapter. His passion, commitment, and leadership redefined Indian cricket. For fans worldwide, Kohli is not just a player—he is a legend whose impact will be felt for generations.
For more exciting cricket updates and stories, visit 
Live Cricket Updates
. 🚀
